Articles.Content:
downloading now!

oops nope thats a march of war update, sorry to disappoint

Not funny at all !

Well, it actually was a little to be honest

In the mean time, Max just posted this on Twatter :

Shoutout to everyone who watched the KSPTV Marathon and helped make it great. You'll be enjoying 0.21 in very little time.

OMG OMG OMG, that sounds good.
I've never been this excited. It's just like with GTA V. I'm gonna explode if I don't get it.

I am clearing the Mun of any landing crafts in preparation for the "VLHB"

"Very Late Heavy Bombardment" that is , considering our Moon's LHB was 3 - 4 Billion years ago.
From watching the media group etc, does anyone know if there are tweakables in .21?
I really want multiplayer. It's a simulator. Aliens isn't eligible.

I really want multiplayer. It's a simulator. Aliens isn't eligible.

you won't get it, and now shush, that's been discussed like a gazillion times already, and we have a very clear answer on the subject from the devs already.
